Title: One Last Step
Description:
This operation would not have come this far without Lilian's aid. 

We may not have much in common, but Lillian is a... dependable ally. After fighting side-by-side in the Dream, we have an odd kinship that was forged by this mission.

Together, we will finish this. With the stones in our hands, it is now safe to take out Raelas and end his little crusade.

Onward.
PortraitGiverText: A druid equipped with enough firepower to burn the Lushdream Crags to ash.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Lilian and Shandris in the Haven Cascades.
